meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of the period following college
meanings.sent1: She pursued further studies in her postcolleges years.
meanings.sent3: His postcolleges adventures led to unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent4: The city's postcolleges vibe was vibrant and exciting.
meanings.sent5: The postcolleges phase brought new challenges and growth.

meanings.definition: a person who has completed their college education
meanings.sent1: The postcolleges was excited to start their career.
meanings.sent2: She met many postcolleges at the alumni event.
meanings.sent3: The postcolleges shared funny college memories with friends.
meanings.sent4: He was a postcolleges navigating the job market.
meanings.sent5: The postcolleges' achievements inspired others to pursue education.
